pr_title: NIFI-7054: Add RecordSinkServiceLookup for dynamic sink routing

timeline.bodyText: I think this only sets the recordSinkService variable once, however if the value changes, and if the reset is invoked, only the first used in the lookup service is reset.  Should there be a way to ensure that all used values are reset when invoked? Or at least to ensure that the recordSinkService is changed when a different recordSink is retrieved?
timeline.author: YolandaMDavis
